person.name: Zishan Jawed
person.title: Backend Engineer & Fintech Specialist
person.summary: Experienced backend engineer specializing in fintech, payment systems, and scalable architecture. Expert in Node.js, Python, and cloud technologies with a proven track record of building high-performance systems that handle millions of transactions daily.
person.bio: I'm a passionate backend engineer with over 8 years of experience building scalable systems for fintech and ecommerce applications. My expertise lies in designing and implementing high-performance payment processing platforms, microservices architectures, and cloud-native solutions. I've worked with leading fintech startups and established companies to deliver robust, secure, and scalable backend systems that power millions of transactions daily. My technical skills span across Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS, with a strong focus on system design, API development, and database optimization. I'm committed to writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices for security, performance, and reliability.

skills.name: Node.js

skills.description: Typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript

availability.message: Available for new projects and consulting opportunities
